sentences.en: " Oh, very well,'said Carrie, lingering in her dressing - room.
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 很好, "嘉莉说, 还在她的化妆室里磨蹭着.

sentences.en: Ada and Richard were lingering for a few moments by the fire.
sentences.cn: 婀达和理查德在火边呆了一会儿.

sentences.en: All their songs have a lingering potency.
sentences.cn: 他们所有的歌曲都有耐人寻味的魅力。

sentences.en: He stood there probing its shadows, tracing its lingering echoes.
sentences.cn: 他站在那观察它的阴影, 追寻萦回不散的回声.

sentences.en: He would rather be killed in a race than die a lingering death in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他宁肯在比赛中丢了性命也不愿在医院里苟延残喘。

sentences.en: I have been lingering here these two hours.
sentences.cn: 我在这儿泡了两个钟头.

sentences.en: Mr Wilkins suffered a lingering death.
sentences.cn: 威尔金斯先生拖了很久才咽气。

sentences.en: Rat, lingering, looked long and doubtfully at certain hoof - marks deep in the sward.
sentences.cn: 老鼠却在那里流连,久久地迷惑不解地看着深深印在草地上的蹄痕.

sentences.en: The issue has been lingering at the back of my mind for a long time.
sentences.cn: 长期以来这个问题一直在我的脑海里萦绕.

sentences.en: The melody is still lingering about long after the performance.
The rise in industrial production helped chase away lingering fears that the economy is slipping into a new recession.
sentences.cn: 工业产出的增长有助于驱除人们对于经济正再次陷入衰退的挥之不去的担忧。

sentences.en: There was a vague something lingering in my thoughts.
sentences.cn: 我脑子里还影影绰绰萦回着一件什么事情.

sentences.en: They met last night to clear up any lingering doubts.
sentences.cn: 他们昨晚会面,消除一切滞留的疑点.

sentences.en: This is due to a lingering belief in objective values.
sentences.cn: 这是因为对客观价值观抱着不放的缘故.

sentences.en: Unemployment and lingering disease cooperated to make his family broken.
sentences.cn: 失业加上长期的疾病,使他倾家荡产.

sentences.en: When Lord Gravesend's family retired to the country, Harry still remained lingering on in London.
sentences.cn: 格雷夫森德勋爵一家到乡下去了, 哈利仍留在伦敦游荡.

words.tran_cn: 徘徊；缓慢消失；沉思（linger的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 在…上拖延；细细思考；仔细欣赏；慢吞吞地做某事

trans.tran_en: continuing to exist for longer than usual or desirable

trans.tran_cn: 逗留( linger的现在分词 )，缓慢消失，苟延残喘，持续看（或思考）
